backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, product definitions, and branch-scoped daily totals storage with access control, ensuring per-user and per-branch isolation using composite keys.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the removal of content above 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' in printed receipts, referencing PrintBill.tsx with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components for authentication, calculator, balance sheet, print views, and utilities for formatting, storage, and branch-scoped operations.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system for light/dark modes and print-specific media queries that hide non-bill UI and optimize receipt display for printing.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with document title 'Varshini Classic Cuisine' and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with branch authentication gate, view mode switching (calculator/daily totals/optimize bill), error boundary integration, and conditional print view rendering.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches render errors and external startup failures, displaying CrashFallbackScreen when errors occur.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGatePag: Authentication gate page requiring branch login to access the app, with optional Internet Identity login section and branding.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchLogin: Branch login form component with username/password inputs, submission handling, error display, and double-submission prevention using the useBranchAuth hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchSessi: Displays the current branch user and provides a logout button when authenticated, using the useBranchAuth hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states, error handling, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/CrashFallbackScr: Error fallback UI displaying error messages with reload button when the application encounters unrecoverable errors.
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Notice bar component displaying draft link expiration warning with copy-to-clipboard functionality for current URL.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: Main view for displaying daily revenue totals and item quantities with day selection, clear-all functionality, and success/error feedback alerts.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: Custom hook that manages daily total state, fetches balance sheet data from backend with localStorage fallback, and handles branch-scoped storage changes.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: Utility functions for managing branch-scoped daily ledger and summary data in localStorage, including loading, saving, clearing, and computing daily totals.
frontend/src/features/calculator/billCod: Generates unique bill codes in format 'BILL-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS-XXXX' using current timestamp and random 4-character alphanumeric suffix.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines predefined catalog of menu items with prices organized by categories (South Indian, North Indian, Rice & Biryani, Curries, Snacks, Beverages, Desserts) including out-of-stock tracking.
Provides currency and number formatting utilities using Intl.NumberFormat for INR currency with 2 decimal places and thousand separators.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Implements case-insensitive matching logic to find existing line items by catalog name and compute total added quantities for catalog items.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: Catalog component for browsing, searching, adding, and managing predefined items with categories, images, out-of-stock status, and quick-add functionality.
TypeScript interface definition for PredefinedItemCatalog component props including item management callbacks.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: React component that renders a printable bill layout with header, line items table, totals breakdown (subtotal, tax, discount, final total), and footer for 'Varshini Classic Cuisine'.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: Manages bill persistence to branch-scoped localStorage including save, retrieve, list, and clear operations with bill format snapshots.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page component managing line items, tax, discounts, and catalog integration with features to add/remove items, save bills, print, and sync with ledger/daily totals.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: TypeScript type definitions for LineItem, CalculatorState, and CalculationBreakdown interfaces used throughout the calculator feature.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Core calculation utilities for line totals, subtotals, tax, and discount breakdown with safe number parsing and non-negative clamping.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Utility function that reads an image file using FileReader and converts it to a base64 data URL string with validation.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/branc: Utility that enforces fixed print location addresses for specific branch users (bachupally and nezampat), preventing user or backend overrides.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/Optim: Configuration page for bill format defaults including receipt style selection, payment QR code upload, and print location address with branch-specific fixed address support.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/optim: Manages loading and saving bill format defaults (receipt style, payment scan URL, print location) to branch-scoped localStorage with fixed address enforcement.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/recei: Defines receipt style types ('classic' and 'compact') with their metadata and sets 'classic' as the default.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useOp: React hook that loads bill format defaults from localStorage and syncs them to backend user profile when authenticated, enforcing fixed addresses for specific branches.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useSy: React hook that syncs bill print location from backend user profile to branch-scoped localStorage on authentication, skipping fixed branch users.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Page component that loads a saved bill by ID from branch-scoped storage, displays it with the configured receipt style, and handles auto-printing and manual print triggers.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranchAuth.tsx: React context provider and hook for branch-based authentication with hardcoded credentials, persisting login state to localStorage and triggering data migration on login.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: React hook that copies the current page URL to clipboard using modern or fallback APIs, tracking success/error status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, daily totals, and balance sheets using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupFailureHand: Custom hook that listens for unhandled promise rejections and errors during app startup, capturing them as startup error state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and print-specific styles for optimized bill receipt printing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/utils/branchScopedStorage.t: Provides branch-scoped localStorage utilities with namespaced keys per branch and handles one-time migration from legacy global storage keys.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Utility functions that display confirmation dialogs before deleting items or clearing all daily totals data.
frontend/src/utils/iiProviderShim.ts: Shim that ensures a safe default Internet Identity provider URL is available, using Vite environment variable or production fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for extracting and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space and enabling plugins for animations, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking one existing feature to remove content above 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' in printed bill receipts.
